rectangles.name: one-pager
rectangles.label: One Pager
rectangles.text:
##### Factify®

# The System of

# Record for PDF

# Drawings

##### Stop drawings from going rogue.

##### Control, sign, and automate every

##### digital and physical copy.

## Share Digitally,

## Print Physically,

## Control via API

 Digital Sharing Send drawings just like always: via email, Teams, or SharePoint. Access control and audit logging travel with the file wherever it goes.

 Physical Print Every printed copy bears a unique code tied to the live document. Anyone with a mobile cam or a scanner can confirm revision status and location. If the rev is obsolete? The file tells them to destroy it and print the correct one.

 Flexible API Factify’s API lets your existing CAD, ERP, PLM, or MES software integrate to create, sign, revoke, or track documents without human clicks. True system-tosystem control.

## Your Drawings,

## Upgraded

 The PDF Stays. Your engineers, suppliers, and partners keep using PDF as the interface.

 The Functionality Grows. Factify turns that same file into a programmable, auditable, and secure source of truth.

 The Result: No more scrap, no more audit panic, no more unauthorized forwarding, no more vendor overreach, no more IP leakage.

 Factified Documents Old PDFs

Access Control

 Only authorized users can open, forward,  or print

 Anyone can view or share freely

Access can be revoked

 Instantly, via API, time triggers, or manually

 No revocation possible

Revision control

 Old versions expire and auto-replaced when new ones are released

 Obsolete revs keep circulating

Printed copies are traceable

 Printing is controlled, every print is uniquely coded and logged

 No way to track or control printed copies

Secure signatures are built-in

 Sign directly in the file; legally bound

 Requires external paid tools like DocuSign

 From CAD to Controlled File Drawing is exported → Factify API adds version ID & access controls.

 Share Anywhere, Stay in Control File is sent via email, Teams, or SharePoint — outdated versions are blocked.

 Signed Right Inside the PDF Manager signs Rev B → Rev A autoexpires, system is instantly notified.

 Scan Alerts You to Destroy Obsolete Copies When Rev C is released, old prints show: “Obsolete – destroy”.

 Every Print is Logged & Tagged Printout includes unique code (e.g., REV-B-0423), tied to a location like “Shelf #7”.

#### Eliminate $50,000+

#### scrap cost from a single

#### outdated drawing

#### Audits demand

#### traceable document

#### control, including

#### physical copies

#### Your competitors are

#### after your IP.

#### You can't afford to be

#### the softest target.

### See your

### drawings

### behave with

### Factify®

 Schedule a Live Demo

 Learn More

## Five Ways Factify

## Transforms Your

## PDF Drawings

##### 1 Version Integrity

 All copies check the live master.  Obsolete revs self-expire.

##### 2 Built-in Sign-Off

 No DocuSign. Executives sign inside the file. Signature is tamper-proof.

##### 3 Physical Traceability

 Every printout is tagged, logged, and verifiable.

##### 4 Granular Access

 Control open, print, and forward rights -  wherever the document is.

##### 5 Audit-Ready Ledger

 Every action (open, print, sign) is  timestamped, immutable.

##### 6 Anonymization Coming soon

 Anonymize or redact parts of your drawings to avoid pricing biases and ensure confidential details are safe

## מסמך זה אינו חשבונית מס/קבלה אין אפשרות לתבוע מע"מ

## לתשומת ליבך, הסכום שנגבה מחשבון סיבוס עשוי להיות שונה מהסכום המצוין במסמך זה למידע מלא ומפורט
